meanings.definition: The state or quality of being silly or foolish.
meanings.sent1: Her constant daffinesses always made everyone smile.
meanings.sent2: The children's daffinesses brightened up the room.
meanings.sent3: His daffinesses during the serious meeting lightened the mood.
meanings.sent4: The daffinesses of the clown entertained the audience.
meanings.sent5: The daffinesses of the puppy brought joy to the family.

meanings.definition: Actions or behavior that are silly or foolish.
meanings.sent1: Running around in circles was just one of his daffinesses.
meanings.sent2: Their daffinesses often led to laughter among friends.
meanings.sent3: The daffinesses of the cat chasing its tail amused the children.
meanings.sent4: His daffinesses at the party made him the center of attention.
meanings.sent5: The daffinesses of the squirrel trying to hide its acorn were adorable.
